channel.title: Need some button ids-----cmon why doesn't anyone ever help?
channel.description: Ok, im trying to get the numbers for the back and forth buttons, and the close button in interface 12624, moparscape sais 12665 in the top left corner when i highlight the close button, so i added [code] case 12665: RemoveAllWindows(); break; [/code] and it didnt work, then i realized that the send frame number doesnt work for buttons, so can some one tell me how to get button ids, or give me the ids to make the close, back, and forward buttons in that interface work? thanks for your time

item.title: Need some button ids-----cmon why doesn't anyone ever help?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Ok, im trying to get the numbers for the back and forth buttons, and the close button in interface 12624, moparscape sais 12665 in the top left corner when i highlight the close button, so i added

case 12665:
RemoveAllWindows();
break;

and it didnt work, then i realized that the send frame number doesnt work for buttons, so can some one tell me how to get button ids, or give me the ids to make the close, back, and forward buttons in that interface work? thanks for your time

Read full topic
item.source: Need some button ids-----cmon why doesn't anyone ever help?
